name: Excited that Eero has announced a truly high-end router with the Eero Max 7. It’s definitely overpriced, but I’ll be getting one so that I can finally take advantage of my 2G fiber connection.

content.html: Excited that Eero has announced a truly high-end router with the Eero Max 7. It’s definitely overpriced, but I’ll be getting one so that I can finally take advantage of my 2G fiber connection.

summary: @cleverdevil BTW, are your devices capable of getting 2G fiber speeds? Even if I plug in directly, I get only 1G. Am I missing something?

content.html: @cleverdevil BTW, are your devices capable of getting 2G fiber speeds? Even if I plug in directly, I get only 1G. Am I missing something?

summary: @pratik my home server (a Synology NAS) has two 1 GbE ports and I have them bonded. It will be the only device on my network that will be able to take advantage of the WAN speed, but Wi-Fi 7 will change everything eventually :)
